result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

3:05 PM Defendant Chad Michael Bonetti in court.  Attorney David Moss in court for Chad Michael Bonetti.  Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Copy of info filed 8-17-22.
Atty Moss - received/reviewed, heard on Count 3 missing paragraph from complaint.
ADA heard - agrees Count 3 should have same language as complaint, will file amended information.
Atty Moss - agrees to continuing today with that understanding.
Atty Moss - waives reading, enters n/g pleas.
Court schedules STC.
3:08 pm
Status conference scheduled for December 19, 2022 at 01:50 pm.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing & Order to Bind Over

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
8:58 AM Defendant Chad Michael Bonetti in court.  Attorney Kathryn Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court heard on past due Dean payments.
Deft heard and will be making a payment today.
Court inquires on atty.
Atty Crowell had to withdraw due to conflict.
Atty Moss is present and is heard - will take the case pending a conflict check.
ADA provides a copy of the complaint.
Court schedules with parties.
9:25 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Letter to Def re: Dean fees (Atty Crowell)
Letter to Court and Deft re: Petition/Order for payment of fees

9:34 AM Defendant Chad Michael Bonetti in court.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Travis A. Crowell in court for Chad Michael Bonetti. 
Court calls case.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Crowell heard - he has recently been appointed to the case, but he has a conflict.
Court withdraws Atty Crowell from the case.
Court schedules.
9:36 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Dean Appt: Atty Crowell- Repayment at $150/mo comm 8-01-2022.

9:04 AM Defendant Chad Michael Bonetti not in court.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Deputy checks the hallway.
Deft does not appear.
DA heard and requests a bench warrant.
Court so orders.
9:05 AM

9:33 AM court recalls case.
Deft showed to court late.
Court quashes warrant previously ordered.
Court inquires on Atty.
Deft heard - has dean paperwork but has not completed it yet.
May hire his own atty.
Clerk provides deft with dean paperwork.
Deft to complete and turn into the COC office before leaving the court house today.
Deft to repay the dean fees at $150 per month beginning 08-01-22.
Court schedules with parties.
DA heard on bond recommendation.
Court imposes $2500 signature bond w/ conditions; sign WOE, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances illegal in WI today without a valid Rx, no contact with D.D., or J.S.
9:38 AM

9:22 AM Defendant Chad Michael Bonetti in court.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court inquires on atty.
Deft heard - has spoken to PD, but does not qualify.
Has just been provided a dean form.
Will complete and turn into the COC office.
Court schedules with parties.
9:23 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
